Package com.deco2800.game.components

Class PlayerCombatStatsComponent

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.components.Component
com.deco2800.game.components.CombatStatsComponent
com.deco2800.game.components.PlayerCombatStatsComponent
public class PlayerCombatStatsComponent
extends CombatStatsComponent
Component used to store information related to combat for the player such as health, attack, etc. Only the player character should have an instance of this class registered. This class can be extended for more specific combat needs.

      Sets the entity's defence level. Must be between 0 and 2 inclusive
      Parameters:
      level - the level to set it to

    • setWoundState

      public void setWoundState​(int wound)
      Sets the player's wound state. Wound state has a min bound of 0 and max of 3.
      Parameters:
      wound - wound state

    • getStateMax

      public int getStateMax()
      Returns the player's state health max value.
      Returns:
      player's state health max value

    • setHealth

      public void setHealth​(int health)
      Sets the player's health state. Caps new health state at current state max and will reduce the player's wound state if their state health runs out.
      Overrides:
      setHealth in class CombatStatsComponent
      Parameters:
      health - state health

    • setStateMax

      public void setStateMax​(int newMax)
      Sets the player's state health max value.
      Parameters:
      newMax - state max value

    • hit

      public void hit​(CombatStatsComponent attacker)
      Calculates taking damage from an enemy. Reduces health by (enemy attack value - player defence value). Gives the player momentary invincibility after getting hit for 0.5 seconds. Also starts player health regeneration if the player does not currently have full state health. If the player gets hit again before regenerating health, the previous regen is cancelled and reset.
      Parameters:
      attacker - Enemy attacker

    • regenStart

      public void regenStart()
      Starts health regeneration that increases player's state health periodically until it reaches max, at which point it stops itself.

    • invincibleStart

      public void invincibleStart​(int length)
      Sets the invincibility check to momentarily prevent player damage
      Parameters:
      length - parameter for how long to set inivisibility for (in milliseconds)
